name: Tropical Pop: Bubble Shooter
description:
Blast & shoot the bubbles to rescue baby pandas! Easy rule but unlimited fun!

Tropical Pop - Bubble Shooter is a funny & addictive bubble shooter game, if you play game you can’t stop it.
Rescue the baby pandas caught by the wicked foxes!

SPECIAL IN GAMES Tropical Pop - Bubble Shooter:
* NO LIFE FEATURE:
- Play game every time, everyday you want, no need buy life feature

* NO WIFI, NO NETWORK, NO PROBLEM:
- Play game perfect on Offline mode

* EASY TO PLAY, HARD TO MASTER:
- Unlimited fun

* GAMES FOR ALL AGES:
- No gender, age, job. Designed perfect for everyone

* TON OF REWARDS, FREE BOOSTER:
- 7 days, 30 days, 90 days events with a lot of rewards, booster

* ADDED CONTENT WEEKLY:
- Add at least 10 new levels weekly

HOW TO PLAY Tropical Pop - Bubble Shooter:
- Drag & release finger to hit bubble
- Match 3 or more same color bubbles to pop
- Craft special boosters to shoot bubble
